components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Zain Network in Sudan

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Zain Network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delays to Virgin Mobile Network In Chile

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Virgin Mobile Network in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A third party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Customers are able to submit their Campaign requests. However, reviews are expected to take longer. Twilio continues to escalate the situation and work with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide updates as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update on 03/03/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update every 7 days. Next update will be provided on 02/24/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 March 2023 at 15:00 PST until 13 March 2023 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 March 2023 at 22:30 PDT until 15 March 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - XOX Com(Red One)

incident_updates.body: The XOX Com(Red One) network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2023 at 09:30 PDT until 15 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XOX Com(Red One) Malaysia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 15 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 16 March 2023 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via a Subset of Shortcodes and Longcodes.

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 16 March 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice and SMS carrier partner maintenance

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call drops to and from UK handsets via a subset of local Long codes and there could be intermittent SMS failures from UK handsets to a subset of Twilio Long codes.
